ghostPost.title: Creativity & Innovation are Important
ghostPost.excerpt:
99% of the people who try to build their Social media brand, Amazon business, or any online business fail because they try to replicate what they see other people doing online.

The reality is that every success story you see on the internet has happened because the person took the learning and knowledge that is globally available but developed their brand/business in the context of their own interests, culture, and environment.

It becomes effortlessly unique when we “infuse” our personality in
ghostPost.plaintext:
99% of the people who try to build their Social media brand, Amazon business, or any online business fail because they try to replicate what they see other people doing online.

The reality is that every success story you see on the internet has happened because the person took the learning and knowledge that is globally available but developed their brand/business in the context of their own interests, culture, and environment.

It becomes effortlessly unique when we “infuse” our personality into our product/content/business.

This is true at a macro level as well.

Countries like China and Japan have developed by learning from western knowledge but developing it in their own culture and environment.

When you become secure inside, you don’t do “competitive analysis” anymore because the competition doesn’t exist for you.

You do YOU!

Source: https://www.linkedin.com/posts/waqashassn_personaldevelopment-selfdevelopment-winatlife-activity-7034784988554301440-RGDJ?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop
ghostPost.html:
99% of the people who try to build their Social media brand, Amazon business, or any online business fail because they try to replicate what they see other people doing online.

The reality is that every success story you see on the internet has happened because the person took the learning and knowledge that is globally available but developed their brand/business in the context of their own interests, culture, and environment.

It becomes effortlessly unique when we “infuse” our personality into our product/content/business.

This is true at a macro level as well.

Countries like China and Japan have developed by learning from western knowledge but developing it in their own culture and environment.

When you become secure inside, you don’t do “competitive analysis” anymore because the competition doesn’t exist for you.

You do YOU!

Source: https://www.linkedin.com/posts/waqashassn_personaldevelopment-selfdevelopment-winatlife-activity-7034784988554301440-RGDJ?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop
